column1: In all of the above circumstances, it is our stance that this is a fit and proper case for granting
of the relief prayed for by the petitioner.
On  that  account,  we  decide  the  petitioner  to  be  reinstated  back  in  service  in  the  Prisons
Department with all outstanding salary payments. In addition, we decide that the petitioner
be granted all promotions and corresponding salary increments due, from 29th January 2018
until the date of his reinstatement back into service.
